summary: User timeline_19 documents a journey through depression and anxiety, showing gradual progress with therapy and medication.

posts.text: I feel so alone. I feel completely hopeless Nobody understands what I'm going through. I haven't showered in a week Decided to join a support group. did some self-care activities Met some people who actually get it. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I'm a burden to everyone I'm spiraling out of control Started using the coping strategies from therapy. practiced my coping strategies I'm trying to be patient with myself. Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I'm worthless and pathetic All this therapy for nothing. I'm completely numb My therapist reminded me how far I've come. reached out to my therapist Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I'm a burden to everyone I'm worthless. I gave up trying Did one small thing today - made my bed. reached out to my therapist Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I have no reason to keep going I isolated myself from all my friends Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. went for a walk to clear my head Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm working on self-compassion
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I can't do anything right I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I'm completely numb But I've been practicing the breathing exercises talked to a friend about what I'm going through and it's starting to help. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. took my medication as prescribed So proud of myself. I'm working on self-compassion Almost slipped up. I'm tired of existing But I reached out for help instead. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. went for a walk to clear my head So proud of myself. Things can get better Almost slipped up. Nothing will ever get better But I reached out for help instead. Things can get better
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I want to give up on everything I can't focus on anything. I can't see a future for myself My therapist recommended meditation so I wrote in my journal and I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Another day of feeling terrible. I'm disgusting I stopped taking my medication Went outside for 10 minutes. used my DBT skills Called a friend. I'm worth the effort
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I'm disgusting I hurt myself again Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. used my DBT skills Noticing small improvements in my mood. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't handle the pressure anymore. I can't do anything right I gave up trying Started setting better boundaries at work. joined a support group Learned to say no to extra projects. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
